text: The University of Concepción is a university in Concepción, Chile. It is the oldest university in the south of Chile. == History == This university was founded by Enrique Molina Garmendia in 1919. == Other websites == * University of Concepción Official website Category:Colleges and universities in Concepción Category:1919 establishments Category:1910s establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Chile
title: University of Concepción
